name: Pink Pop
description:
**PINK POP**
  
**Description:**
  
*A cool citrus soda pop with boysenberry & black currant accents*
  
**Notes:**
  
**FLV Pink Fruit** is a bit on the weak side. For this reason, I added it at 3.5%.
  
**FLV Citrus Soda** is very enjoyable. I noticed that higher percentages make its' "fizzy" soda quality more prominent. I also wanted its' lime nuance to be the highlight of this mix.
  
**FLV Boysenberry** just *had* to be included here for its' delectable candy-like taste. I used it low because it can easily smother a mix.
  
**FLV Black Currant** to me, is a very potent flavor. For this reason, I included it in my soda pop but kept it on the low side.
  
**FLV Sweetness** was added because I wanted my pink soda pop to be nice & sweet!
 
**Add 2 drops WS-23 per 15ml for that cool punch!!**
 
**SNV Certified**
  
**70% VG**
 
  
*Please don't use this recipe for commercial gain, as it is being shared in good faith for the enjoyment of the community. I hope you enjoy!*
author: SixStrings952

reviews.text: Very solid mix. I had to sub the FLV Blct for FAs, works very well. Thank you.
Very nice and refreshing. The citrus soda and pink fruit make an excellent combination. Thank you sixstrings!
